title: Media Release: Statement by Sri Lanka High Commission, London on the Channel 4 Film  “ Sri Lanka ’s Killing Fields”
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma The Government of Sri Lanka categorically denies the allegations that it has deliberately targeted its own civilians, as the Channel 4 alleges in its film “ Sri Lanka ’s Killing Fields”. The Government of Sri Lanka, having being fully cognizant of the plight of all civilians in Sri Lanka…
